title: Aleene's Stop-Fraying 4oz,White,15629
description: Keep a bottle of Aleene’s Stop Fraying in your purse or desk drawer, as well as on your craft table. It’s the glue to have to keep fabric from fraying when you don’t have your sewing machine handy! It also seals up the ends of braiding and trims. It’s easy to apply and dries clear, soft and flexible. Recommended for: hems seams trims cording braids
